response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the fridge without any errors. The next step is to open the fridge to access the strawberries inside.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the strawberries from the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the bowl on the countertop.
(5) Put the strawberries in the bowl.
response.code:
